wikipedia_page.main: Derek Jefferson (born 5 September 1948) is an English former professional footballer. During his career he made over 150 appearances  for Ipswich Town between 1966 and 1972, where he was nicknamed 'Chopper'.

response: * Derek Jefferson (born 1948), played for Ipswich Town
